name: Triangle of Kisses
storyline: Triangle of Kisses is an original Maybe series. In it, you play as Mia Lewis, a woman forced to quit her previous job after a work fiasco with her coworker-turned-ex. Vowing to never again date a fellow co-worker, she quietly moves to Dwight Motors- a new company- to work at, lining up a blind date on the side in order to move on with her life. But the moment her blind date shows up, he has a ring ready, and he's proposing to her like he knows her? Who is this mysterious man, and what does she want with her?
summary: After an office romance nightmare, you vow to start a new life. But before you do, not only does a young & rich boss and a sweet newbie appear, but also a gorgeous police officer next door as well!
